Package uk.ac.rdg.resc.godiva.client.widgets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DialogBoxWithCloseButton.CentrePosIF  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationButton
    A button which can be used to request, display, and switch off animations
    BaseSelector
    Base class for selection widgets.
    CopyrightInfo
    Implementation of CopyrightInfoIF which just displays the information as a Label
    DialogBoxWithCloseButton
    Extended DialogBox widget with close button inside the pop-up header
    ElevationSelector
    An implementation of ElevationSelectorIF which presents the available elevations as a drop down list.
    ErrorBox
    A popup error box which displays a custom message
    Info
    Implementation of the InfoIF which just displays the information as a Label
    LayerSelectorCombo
    An implementation of LayerSelectorIF which presents the layers in a popup tree.
    LayerSelectorTree
    An implementation of LayerSelectorIF which presents the layers in a popup tree.
    MapArea
    A widget containing the main OpenLayers map.
    MapArea.FixedLayerDetails
    A class to store details for a "fixed" layer - i.e.
    PaletteSelector
    Implementation of PaletteSelectorIF which can be either horizontally or vertically oriented, and contains controls for setting all palette variables
    ScreenPosition
    Defines a screen position.
    StartEndTimePopup
    A popup which allows a user to select start and end times.
    TimeSelector
    Implementation of TimeSelectorIF which presents dates and times (and ranges where applicable) as separate drop-down boxes
    UnitsInfo
    Implementation of UnitsInfoIF which displays the units as a Label
